author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: أن یا حرف الحيّ لقد سَمِعَت أُذُن الله ندائک ولاحظت عین الله کتابک وینادیک حینئذ عن جهة العرش بآیات نفسه المهیمن القیّوم فطوبی
translation: O Letter of the Living! The ear of God hath heard thy cry, and His eyes have beheld thy written supplication. He is calling thee from His seat of glory, and is revealing unto thee the verses that have been sent down by Him Who is the Help in Peril, the Self-Subsisting.
